messages.content: helpful quad helped him to his feet!
I think it's time to let him go, for your life's sake!
I’m with you, like shouldn’t we call someone or make sure this was followed up on? This poor guy.
Tell her boyfriend and send him the screenshots of her saying she’s having affairs for proof. Then cut this toxic person out of your life!
He is sacrificing himself for our sins. [NAME] bless.
[NAME] bless them and their racist logo
Tough times don't last tough people do... Die'n is easy, living isn't, make the best of it
Bide your time, keep your eyes open, and build the reputation and relationship needed. The opportunity will come.
I feel like you need to get out of your current situation for the sake of your own happiness.
If you want any hope of getting better, you must stop everything and anything with underage girls...forever
It's a repost but this space is too kindness for a downvote, take care
Eh, it'll be alright. Just another battle scar haha. Best of luck to the both of us!
Don't chase after out of position teammates. Your life as a Mercy is more important. Let them fools die and learn their lesson.
[NAME] will never do anything to help you. You must stand up for yourself.
>Eat more salad Might I also suggest some vegetables too. You'll feel infinitely better
You should take the time and go to the doctor.
You gotta work on you dude!! If you're not confident you're not ready, get yourself straight And all will fall into place.
If it's true i'm sad he's leaving but I wish him nothing but the best.
Don’t wait. Take control of your life back and leave. You know that’s what’s going to happen.
yikes I am not reading that, the napkins are over there sir, have a nice day
Best of luck mate. I’ve yet to reach my limit but this brought me closer
I can help out, pm me :)
She sounds like she could be depressed. People who have depression need care, love and help to get better, not internet shaming.
